title: T206 Johnny Kling OM for sale

posts.post_title: T206 Johnny Kling OM for sale
posts.post_content:
Have a nice CSG 2 Johnny Kling old mill for sale or trade. Lower pop than his Hindu. Would love to trade for a cub Hindu, but if not sell outright for $900.

Text me 219-218-8414 or email me [url]kaufmannb14@gmail.com[/url] if interested for scans.


Thanks
